title:
Feature:
Become an 
Insider modal
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
desktop website 
https://www.usabaseball.com/
and a pop-up opens, labeled 
"Become a USA Baseball Insider"
custom_steps: When the user taps the modal
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "Official USA Baseball 
News" sign up sheet

title:
Feature:
Official USA
Baseball News
sign up
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Become a USA Baseball 
Insider" modal and is viewing the "Official USA 
Baseball News" sign up sheet
custom_steps:
When the user enters text/data in the form, then 
clicks the "Subscribe" button
custom_expected:
Then the fields on the form are cleared and this message 
link displays, "Thank you for subscribing.  Would you like 
to return to USA Baseball Shop (link)

title:
Feature:
Welcome email
custom_preconds:
Given:   User has completed the "Official USA 
Baseball News" sign up sheet and navigated to 
user's email inbox
custom_steps: When the user views his/her inbox
custom_expected: Then a "Welcome to the team!" email is present

title:
Feature:
Welcome email
content
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Welcome to the 
team!" email
custom_steps: When the user opens the email
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a large photo with a "Welcome to 
the team!" headline
   And a graphic message to receive $10 of your next order
      of $50 or more"
   And a code to obtain that discount

title: Feature:  User navigates to the USA Baseball mobile website
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
desktop website and is viewing the home page
https://www.usabaseball.com/
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the home screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees The "USA Baseball" logo
   And a row of navigational tabs
   And global navigational links
   And a hero, with a headline on the left 2/3rds of the page
   And a "What's Hot" section on the right 1/3rd of the 
      page

title:
Feature:
Anti-Doping
tab
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Anti-Doping" tab
custom_expected:
Then the "TOKYO 2020 ANTI-DOPING 
INFORMATION" (https://www.usada.org/) site opens in a 
new tab

title:
Feature:
Golden Spikes
tab
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Golden Spikes tab
custom_expected: Then the "Golden Spikes Award" page opens in a new tab

title:
Feature:
Donate
tab
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Donate" tab
custom_expected:
Then the "Give For Glory "site (https://donate.giveforglory.com/give/337288/#!/donation/checkout)
opens in a new tab
   And the page contains a donation form

title:
Feature:
Base
tab
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Base" tab
custom_expected:
Then the "BASE (Baseball Athlete Safety Education)"
page opens in a new tab
(http://www.usabdevelops.com/base)

title:
Feature:
Shop
tab
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Shop" tab
custom_expected:
Then the "USA Shop" site opens in a new tab
(https://usabaseballshop.com/)

title:
Feature:
Top 
Navigation
mega menus
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the top navigational
links
custom_steps: When the user hovers over each of the links
custom_expected:
Then (with the exceptions of the "Video" link) a mega
menu opens with text that corresponds to the selected 
link
   And with a menu of links that are relevant to the 
     topic

title:
Feature:
Development
sub-menu 
links
custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the Development 
link in the top nav and sees a list of sub-menu 
links (e.g. Development> Hit and Run)
custom_steps: When the use clicks the "Hit and Run" link
custom_expected:
Then the "Hit and Run Baseball" site opens
(https://www.mlb.com/hit-and-run) in a new tab

title:
Feature:
Team USA
sub-menu 
links
custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the Team USA
link in the top nav and sees a list of sub-menu 
links (e,g, Team USA> Women's' National Team)
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the "Women's' National Team"
link
custom_expected:
Then the "WOMEN'S NATIONAL TEAM HOME"
page opens in a new tab

title:
Feature:
Events
sub-menu 
links
custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the Events
link in the top nav and sees a list of sub-menu 
links (e,g, Events> Hank Aaron Invitational)
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the "Hank Aaron Invitational"
link
custom_expected:
Then the "Hank Aaron Invitational" page opens 
in a new tab

title:
Feature:
Video link
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the top navigational
links
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Video" link
custom_expected:
Then a new page opens, labeled "Latest Video"
opens
   And the page displays an array of cards in 4 columns
   And each card displays an image
   And each card displays the time length of the video

title:
Feature:
Play Video
custom_preconds: Given:  User is viewing the "Latest Video" page
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the 'start' arrow on three or 
more of the cards
custom_expected:
Then the video screen opens
   And the selected video starts to play
   And the title, date and video time displays under the screen
   And the "Latest Video" thumbnails are visible in the right rail

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section
of the site
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the start arrow
   And the video starts to play
   And the user clicks an icon to expand/contract the 
     screen
   And clicks the CC icon to enable/disable
     closed captioning
   And moves the audio slide bar back and forth
   And taps the 15 skip back and 15 skip forward 
     buttons
   And taps the pause/play button
   And slides the video progress bar (aka scrubber)
     back and forward
   And verifies the time indicators are functioning
     correctly
custom_expected: Then all the controls work as expected

title:
Feature:
USABAT
sub-menu 
links
custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the USABAT
link in the top nav and sees a list of sub-menu 
links (e,g, USABAT> Approved Bat List)
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Approved Bat List "link
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the "APPROVED BAT LIST" page
with a columnar list of bats that are approved for youths

title:
Feature:
About
sub-menu 
links
custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the USABAT
link in the top nav and sees a list of sub-menu 
links (e,g, About> Alumni in the Majors)
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Alumni in the Majors" link
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the 
"USA BASEBALL ALUMNI IN THE MAJORS (2021)" page
   And clickable team logos display
   And lists of players by team is visible

custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the Development 
link in the top nav and sees a red Learn More 
link in the left side of the mega menu
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Learn More" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "Development" site
(https://usabdevelops.com/) with these tabs:
- Development Initiatives
- Education
- Certification
- Blog

custom_preconds:
Given: User is hovering over the About
link in the top nav and sees a red Learn More 
link in the left side of the mega menu
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "Learn More" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "About" page of the site
    And the About link displays with a red underline

title:
Feature:
Banner hero 
image
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps:
When the user sees a Banner Hero Image
   And the image is under the navigational links
   And the image contains a clickable header
   And text under the header link
custom_expected: Then the user is able to click the header link

title:
Feature:
Banner Hero
link
custom_preconds:
Given:  User is viewing the Banner hero image and
sees a header
custom_steps: When the user hovers over the header
custom_expected: Then the link is visible as underlined

title:
Feature:
Clicking Banner 
Hero link
redirects
custom_preconds:
Given:  User is viewing the Banner hero image and
sees a clickable header
custom_steps: When the user clicks the link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected  to the "USA BASEBALL NEWS"
page
   And the page features a photo and news story that 
corresponds to the Banner Hero

title:
Feature:
What's Hot
custom_preconds:
Given:  The user is viewing the USA BASEBALL 
NEWS page and locates a "What's Hot" page 
element
custom_steps: When the user views the "What's Hot" page element
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a large, clickable, thumbnail over 
three smaller clickable thumbnails

title:
Feature:
What's Hot
thumbnails
custom_preconds:
Given:  The user is viewing the USA BASEBALL 
NEWS page and locates a "What's Hot" page 
element
custom_steps: When the user clicks each of the thumbnails
custom_expected:
Then the page auto-scrolls to the corresponding news
article and photo

title:
Feature:
Featured 
section
custom_preconds:
Given: User has navigated to the USA Baseball 
website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user scrolls below the Banner Hero
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a "FEATURED" section with an array
of clickable cards of the left 2/3rds of the page
   And the array is in two columns

title:
Feature:
Featured 
Section cards
custom_preconds:
Given:  User is viewing the "Featured" section of the
home page
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the headline link on any of 
the cards in the section
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the corresponding news 
article and photo

title:
Feature:
Featured;
See More News
link
custom_preconds:
Given:  User is viewing the top of the "Featured" 
section of the home page
custom_steps: When the user clicks the "See More News" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "USA BASEBALL NEWS"
page 
   And displays various articles (~20) and photos all the 
way to the footer

title:
Feature:
Find Events
and Times
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Featured"
section to the "Find Events and Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user views the "Find Events and Teams"
section
custom_expected:
Then the user sees "Find Events and Teams" header
   And text "Enter your date of birth..."
   And a "Month" DD arrow
   And a "Day" DD arrow
   And a "Year" DD arrow
   And a "Submit" button

title:
Feature:
Find Events
and Times;
DD's and 
Submit
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Featured"
section to the "Find Events and Teams"
custom_steps:
When the user selects options from the "Month," 
"Day" and "Year" DDL's
   And clicks the "Submit" button
custom_expected:
Then a clickable list of "EVENTS AND TEAMS" opens in a
modal

title:
Feature:
Find Events
and Times;
Events and
Teams
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Events and Teams"
modal
custom_steps: When the user clicks an option on the list
custom_expected:
Then the corresponding page opens with details and 
photo of the event the user selected
   And the "Events" link is highlighted in the global nav
   And the "About" tab is selected in the local nav

title:
Feature:
Videos
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Events and 
Teams" component to the "Videos" section of the 
home page
custom_steps: When the user views the "Videos" section
custom_expected:
Then the user sees an array of video cards on the left
2/3rds of the page
   And the array is in two columns
   And each card displays a 'start' arrow

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section of 
the home page
custom_steps:
When the user clicks the 'start' arrow on three or 
more of the cards
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "Video" page 
   And the selected video has started to play
   And the video is playing as expected
   And the audio is clearly heard
   And the "Video" tab is highlighted in the global nav

title:
Feature:
Videos;
See More 
Videos
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section of 
the home page
custom_steps:
When, at the top of the "Videos" module, the user
clicks the "See More Videos" link
custom_expected: Then the user is redirected to the "Latest Video" page

title:
Feature:
Footer
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the 'Footer' of the
home page
custom_steps: When the user views the footer
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the "USA Baseball" logo 
   And "Base," Golden Spikes" and "Shop" buttons
   And clickable social media icons
   - Facebook
   - Twitter
   - Instagram
   - YouTube
   And six column headers, under which are links to
      topics related to the column header:
   - Development
   - Team USA
   - Events
   - Video
   - USABAT
   - About

Feature:
Become an

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website 
https://www.usabaseball.com/
and a pop-up opens, labeled

custom_steps: When the user taps the modal
custom_expected:

sign up

Insider" modal and is viewing the "Official USA 
Baseball News" sign up sheet
custom_steps:
When the user enters text/data in the form, then 
taps the "Subscribe" button
custom_expected:
Then the fields on the form are cleared and this message 
link displays, "Thank you for subscribing.  Would you like 
to return to USA Baseball Shop

title:
Feature:
Welcome email
custom_preconds:
Given:   User has completed the "Official USA 
Baseball News" sign up sheet and navigated to 
user's email inbox
custom_steps: When the user views his/her inbox
custom_expected: Then a "Welcome to the team!" email is present

title:
Feature:
Welcome email
content
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Welcome to the 
team!" email
custom_steps: When the user opens the email
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a large photo with a "Welcome to 
the team!" headline
   And a graphic message to receive $10 of your next order
      of $50 or more"
   And a code to obtain that discount

title: Feature:  User navigates to the USA Baseball mobile website
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the home screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees The "USA Baseball" logo
   And a hamburger menu icon
   And a hero, over a story headline related
     to the hero
   And the top of the "What's Hot" section of the screen

title:
Feature:
Select 
Team/Event
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps:
When the user taps the down arrow on the 
"Select Team/Event" screen element
custom_expected: Then a list of "Teams, " "Events" and "Other" links opens

title:
Feature:
Select a Team
link
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Select Team/Event" 
screen element
custom_steps:
When the user taps a link (e.g. 18U National Team)
on the "Team" portion of the list
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to an article related to the
corresponding link

title:
Feature:
Select an
Events link
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Select Team/Event" 
screen element
custom_steps:
When the user taps a link (e.g. National High School 
Invitational) on the "Events" portion of the list
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to an article related to the
corresponding link

title:
Feature:
Select 
Other link
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Select Team/Event" 
screen element
custom_steps:
When the user taps a link (e.g. General News) on 
the "Other" portion of the list
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to an article related to the
corresponding link

title:
Feature:
Close the 
Select 
Team/Event
DDL
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has opened the "Select Team/Event" 
screen element
custom_steps: When the user taps the accordion arrow (top right)
custom_expected:
Then the list is dismissed 
   And the accordion arrow returns to the 'down' position

title:
Feature:
View More
button
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website 
   And opens the first article on the home screen
   And is viewing the first article   
   And only a portion of the article is visible
custom_steps: When the user taps the "View More" button
custom_expected: Then the entire article is visible

title:
Feature:
View Less
button
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website 
   And is viewing the first article on the home screen  
   And the entire article is visible
custom_steps:
When the user reads the entire article
   And taps ther "View Less" button at the end of 
      the article
custom_expected:
Then the article returns to its original state
   And only a portion is visible

title:
Feature:  open
Hamburger 
menu
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps: When the user taps the hamburger icon (top-left)
custom_expected:
Then the menu opens 
   And displays these links
   - Development
   - Team USA
   - Events
   - Video
   - USABAT
   - About
   - Anti-Doping
   - Golden Spikes
   - Donate
   - Base
   - Shop

title:
Feature:  close 
Hamburger 
menu
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has  tapped the hamburger icon
and is viewing the menu
custom_steps:
When the user click the red "X" at the top of the
menu
custom_expected: Then the hamburger menu closes

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Development 
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps "Development"
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the 'Development' site
(usabdevelops.com) in a new screen

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Team USA
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Team USA" link
custom_expected:
Then a new menu opens, related to Team USA, opens
with links to related  to "Team USA" (e.g. Olympic Team)

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has tapped the "Team USA" link
in the hamburger menu and is viewing a list of
related links
custom_steps:
When the user taps one of those links (e.g. Olympic 
Team)
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the corresponding screen
(e.g. For Olympic Team, that would be "Olympic 
Team Home")

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Events
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Events" link
custom_expected:
Then a new menu opens with related links 
(e.g. Olympic Team)

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has tapped the "Events" link
in the hamburger menu and is viewing a list of
related links
custom_steps:
When the user taps one of those links (e.g. "National 
High School Invitational")
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the corresponding screen
(e.g. For "National High School Invitational," that would 
be "National High School Invitational Home")

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Video
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Video" link
custom_expected:
Then a screen of video cards opens
   And each card displays the time duration (lower-right)
   And a Title of the Video and date posted, under the card

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
USABAT
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "USABAT" link
custom_expected:
Then a new menu opens with related links 
(e.g. "Bat Advisory Committee")

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has tapped the "USABAT" link
in the hamburger menu and is viewing a list of
related links
custom_steps:
When the user taps one of those links 
(e.g. "Approved Tee Ball List")
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the corresponding screen
(e.g. For "Approved Tee Ball List," that would 
be "Approved Tee Balls")

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
About
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "About" link
custom_expected:
Then a new menu opens with related links 
(e.g. Media Services)

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has tapped the "About" link
in the hamburger menu and is viewing a list of
related links
custom_steps:
When the user taps one of those links 
(e.g. "Media Services")
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the corresponding screen
(e.g. For "Media Services," that would 
be "USA Baseball Media Services")

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Anti-Doping
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Anti-Doping" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a new site opens 
showing a "Tokyo 2020 Anti-Doping Information" 
header in a new screen
(usada.org)

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Golden Spikes
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Golden Spikes" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to a new screen, "Golden 
Spikes Award"

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Donate
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Donate" link
custom_expected:
Then the "Give For Glory" site (donate.giveforglory.com)
opens in a new screen
   And the page contains a donation form

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Base
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Base" link
custom_expected:
Then the "Base" site (usabdevelops.com/
opens in a new screen

title:
Feature:
Hamburger;
Shop
link
custom_preconds: Given:  User has opened the hamburger menu
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Shop" link
custom_expected:
Then the "Shop" site (usabaseballshop.com)
opens in a new screen
   And a "Join...Mailing List" modal opens
   And, after dismissing the modal, a merchandise screen 
      is visible

title:
Feature:
What's Hot
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has navigated to the USA Baseball
mobile website and is viewing the home page
custom_steps:
When the user scrolls down the page to the "What's
Hot" section of the screen
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a full image and type  
   And two smaller images (and type) 
   And all link to related articles

title:
Feature:
What's Hot
links
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "What's Hot" 
section of the screen
custom_steps: When he user taps the images in the section
custom_expected: Then each image will redirect to a related article

title:
Feature:
Featured
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Featured" 
section of the screen
   And the section contains multiple article cards
custom_steps: When the user taps any of the cards
custom_expected: Then the user is redirected to a full article and photo image

title:
Feature:
See More News
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Featured"
section of the screen to a "See More News" link
custom_steps: When the user taps the "See More News" link
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "USA Baseball News" 
screen
   And the screen displays multiple articles

title:
Feature:
Safesport;
Get Trained 
Today
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Featured"
section of the screen to a "Safesport-Get Trained 
Today" clickable page element
custom_steps: When the user taps the "Learn More" button
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "US Center For Safesport"
site (https://uscenterforsafesport.org/ngb-services/)

title:
Feature:
Find Events and
Teams
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to a "Find Events and 
Teams" section
   And the section includes Month/Day/Year
      DD selectors
custom_steps:
When the user selects Month/Day/Year
   And taps the "Submit" button
custom_expected: Then a list of Events and Teams opens

title:
Feature:
Videos
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section
of the screen
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the section
custom_expected:
Then the user sees a number of Video cards
   And each card contains a 'start' arrow
   And each card displays the title of the video
   And each card shows the date posted to the site

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section
of the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the 'start' arrow on 3 or 
more of the videos
custom_expected:
Then the videos start to play as expected
   And the audio sounds correct
   And the user sees video controls
   And a list of "Latest Video" thumbnails

custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled to the "Videos" section
of the screen
custom_steps:
When the user taps the start arrow
   And the video starts to play
   And the user taps an icon to expand/contract the 
     screen
   And taps an audio mute/unmute button
   And taps the 15 skip back and 15 skip forward 
     buttons
   And taps the pause/play button
   And slides the video progress bar (aka scrubber)
     back and forward
   And verifies the time indicators are functioning
   And opens and closes the mirroring icon
custom_expected: Then all the controls work as expected

title:
Feature:
See More
Videos
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Latest Videos" 
section of the screen 
   And sees a "See More" button
custom_steps: When the user taps the "See More" button
custom_expected: Then additional videos display

title:
Feature:
Featured 
Photos
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Latest Videos" 
section of the screen 
   And sees a "Featured Photos" section
custom_steps:
When the user swipes left and right on the cards
in that section
   And taps the navigation buttons at the bottom
custom_expected:
Then all the card and the photos they contain can be 
viewed, one at a time

title:
Feature:
Upcoming 
Events
custom_preconds:
Given:  User has scrolled below the "Featured 
Photos" section of the screen 
   And sees the "Upcoming Events" section
   And the section sees a list of events and their 
     dates
custom_steps:
When the user taps an event in the list 
(e.g. Regional Clinic (Trenton))
custom_expected:
Then a new screen opens in a new site 
(usabdevelops.com) with information related to the 
event selected by the user

Feature:
Education-
Learn More

     element

page element
custom_expected:
Then the user is redirected to the "Education" page
of a new site
(usabdevelops.com)

title:
Feature:
Footer
custom_preconds: Given:  User has scrolled to the footer
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the footer
custom_expected:
Then the user sees the USA Baseball logo
   And social media icon links
   And tabs ranging from "Development" to "About"
   And buttons labeled "Base," Golden Spikes" and
     "Shop"

title:
Feature:
Footer Tabs
custom_preconds: Given:  User has scrolled to the footer
custom_steps:
When the user, one at a time, opens each of the 
tabs (e.g. USABAT)
custom_expected:
Then a list of related subject links displays in each tab
(e.g. "About USABAT," "FAQ," "Bat Advisory Committee,"
"Approved Bat List" and "Approved Tee Ball List")

title:
Feature:
Terms of Use
custom_preconds: Given:  User has scrolled to the footer
custom_steps:
When the user taps the "Terms of Use" link at the
bottom of the footer
custom_expected:
Then the "Terms of Use" screen opens
   And the page displays a lengthy list of terms

title:

Privacy Policy

custom_steps:
